title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project scope, user stories, functional and non-functional requirements, and potential challenges for the MultisensoryNarrativeCreator platform. Identify key stakeholders and subject matter experts to involve in the requirements gathering process.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations with external services or hardware devices.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend components for creating and experiencing multisensory narratives.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and logic for handling multisensory narrative creation and playback.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and storage solution for multisensory narrative data.

title: Integrate Hardware and External Services
description: Integrate any necessary hardware devices or external services for delivering multisensory experiences (e.g., smell generators, haptic feedback devices).

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for user authentication, data encryption, and protection against potential vulnerabilities.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and functionality of the platform.
